Description: Lifeables is an online service that automatically collects and curates family information spread across social networks into one storyline.
Full Description: Lifeables is a service that automatically collects and curates the little moments that tell the larger story of your family's life. The service is currently in public beta at Lifeables.com. Consumers simply tell us which family members they want to include in their story, and where they keep their family content (e.g. Facebook, Twitter, Flickr, DropBox).  Then their patent-pending technology automates the entire curation process, finding content only about those family members and filtering out all the rest. The technology also learns what is important to the user as they begin to "collect" memories.  So the more the user is on Lifeables, the more automated it becomes.  They even do the formatting for you.  Any item can be kept private or you can invite family to join you, setting privacy and sharing levels down to the individual family member.

Industries: Consulting, Dating, Social Media, Social Network
Industry Groups: Community and Lifestyle, Internet Services, Media and Entertainment, Professional Services
Description: At DateSalad, we simply believe in people. Furthermore, we believe in people being who and as they are. We don't dare to assume.
Full Description: At DateSalad, we simply believe in people. Furthermore, we believe in people being who and as they are. We don't dare to assume that we know what's best for you. Rather we feel that only you know what's best for you, even if you don't quite know it yet. DateSalad provides an online/mobile dating solution that promotes self-exploration as a means of discovering and understanding what works best for you in dating. From there, DS provides a platform from which you can be as general or as selective as you'd like in order to build your own exclusive dating experience – no matter what your preferences may be. Instead of publicizing your dating criteria for the entire dating community to see, we program the application in a way that all members outside of network never even see you – period.  Your time is scarce and therefore precious, you shouldn't have to waste it sifting through profiles of people that you would not consider dating. You also should not be inundated with emails and flirts from individuals that you clearly would have no interest in. With DateSalad, instead of being overwhelmed by the densely populated online dating market, we allow you to keenly focus on only what you want. Less distraction, more interaction, better results.  DateSalad is for the discerning individual who believes in quality over quantity. The name comes from our view on the way that dating should be - stimulating, pure, and poised to develop naturally or as we say in short, “crisp, fresh, and organic.” The name also speaks to the myriad of options that you have in online dating that we help you simplify to your tastes. There is that special someone for everyone. As such, we believe that when you know who you are and what works for you, you will know what you are looking for. With our system, the match will be mutual and more likely to produce a meaningful connection. That's why we say, ""When it's your mix, it's your match.

Industries: Facebook, Search Engine, Social Network
Industry Groups: Internet Services, Platforms
Description: Wefollow is an online directory enabling individuals to find people of the same interests from Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and Linkedin.
Full Description: Wefollow helps you discover prominent people with an interest. Wefollow was created by Kevin Rose and a small team in 2009 as an experiment to help users find like-minded people to follow. The project was later rolled into Digg. When Betaworks announced they had acquired Digg’s core assets, the original engineer, Jeff Hodsdon, acquired the Wefollow project. He is now focused on taking Wefollow forward and driving the team towards a new vision. Upon signup each user enters up to 5 interests of theirs. Each user on Wefollow has explicitly specified their interests. Currently at the core of Wefollow is their "Prominence Score". Wefollow uses an algorithm similar to Google's PageRank to give user a series of 1-100 score in each of their interests. Using their connections from Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and Linkedin they look at who is connected to who and how prominent those people are.

Full Description: LocalCircles is the world's first comprehensive local social network for your daily life. Typically, when you need to find a good doctor, an after-school class, an auto-service center, or what local factors to consider before buying an apartment - you would ask a neighbor, a co-parent, a colleague, or a trusted local friend. Many a times, if your local contacts do not have the answer, you turn to the Internet, do hit and trial, or simply wait until you find a credible source of information. Description: Turn 10 Studios is the creator of the Forza franchise.
Full Description: Located in the heart of Redmond, Washington, Turn 10 Studios is the creator of the Forza franchise, including the Motorsport titles and the recently released Forza Horizon.  Turn 10 is a subdivision of Microsoft Studios, established in 2001 as a first-party racing game developer. Turn 10 Studios began working on the original Forza Motorsport to fill the void of simulation racing games on the Xbox console. With an emphasis on driving mechanics and the newest features of Xbox LIVE, the original Forza Motorsport was released in May of 2005 to much critical acclaim and community support.  Building off its success, Turn 10’s team immediately began working on a sequel intended to be released on Microsoft’s new Xbox 360 console. Forza Motorsport 2 was released in May of 2007, pushing the boundaries of User Generated Content (UGC) with a robust livery editor and online Auction House, giving casual players new options for expressing their creativity on and off the track. With new online tools, the Forza community thrived as painters, tuners, seller, and racers shared their creations via Forzamotorsport.net.  In late 2007, Turn 10 Studios began an intense development process for the next Forza installment. Their most ambitious project to date, Forza Motorsport 3 boasted enhanced graphics, driving physics, and UGC. Turn 10 released the game in October 2009 to critical and commercial success.  Released in October of 2011, Forza Motorsport 4 brought even more excitement to the franchise with Kinect integration, including the stunning Autovista experience. With hundreds of cars rendered in stunning detail, and new tracks to hone skills on, Forza Motorsport 4 was another resounding success for Turn 10 Studios.  With Forza Horizon, the Forza universe has expanded to the open road. Action racing puts the player in an open world that demands driving skill and rewards driving style. With lots to explore and a cutting-edge soundtrack to compliment the scenery, Horizon is the latest evolution of the authentic Forza experience. Horizon was released in late October 2012.  Turn 10 Studios has always been dedicated to pushing this franchise to new heights while delivering truly incredible experiences for car enthusiasts of all types. They would like to thank their community and fans, new and old, for their support in helping us achieve their goals.

Industries: Air Transportation, Leisure, Social Network, Travel
Industry Groups: Community and Lifestyle, Internet Services, Transportation, Travel and Tourism
Description: Set Jet is a revolutionary new approach to facilitating private jet air travel.
Full Description: Set Jet is a Membership based private jet charter flight platform, available exclusively for its security pre-screened and approved Members. Membership is available to a limited number of approved members in each city. Set Jet’s revolutionary new approach to facilitating private jet air travel was conceived by a group of successful entrepreneurs with decades of diverse marketing and aviation experience. The Set Jet concept was created in order to provide its Members with an unparalleled experience. Set Jet facilitates VIP private jet charters to six of the most frequently traveled destinations on the West Coast; Scottsdale, Las Vegas, Los Angeles, Orange County, San Diego and San Francisco, as well as non-stop private jet charter flights between Los Angeles and New York City. Members may also participate in seasonal private jet charter flights between Los Angeles and Cabo San Lucas and Scottsdale and Cabo San Lucas, as well as between Los Angeles and Aspen and Scottsdale and Aspen. Set Jet facilitates this unique members-only based service from non-congested and conveniently located VIP private terminals, without the traditional inconveniences related to commercial air travel, such as advance notice for booking flights, price premiums for last minute travel, time allowance for driving to primary airports, check-in requirements, security delays and parking expenses. Set Jet facilitates the safest and most luxurious form of air travel in the industry, at a reasonable price, without any of the inconveniences typically associated with flying commercial or the expense of flying private. Set Jet facilitates private jet charter flights for its Members on the proven Bombardier Challenger 850/CRJ 200 and CRJ900 aircraft, specifically customized to an ultra-VIP, 15-19 seat cabin configuration. Set Jet uses FAA PART 135 operators to execute all charter flights and does not own or operate any aircraft. Pilots are typically military-trained jet fighter pilots of the highest caliber, with extensive experience and an impeccable service background. Set Jet’s customer service representatives are trained to provide exceptional five-star service.

Description: BizBrag is a web platform involved in social marketing by distributing its users' business content to local social networking feeds.
Full Description: BizBrag is a powerful, proprietary platform for the distribution of social content from the enterprise to the local business' social network feeds.  By way of web pages called, Braggits, the enterprise is able to create messaging that is more than just a text post or a post of images. From Braggits, customers at the local level can interact by purchasing products, fill out lead forms and more.  The real power comes in the scalable distribution and customization of these Braggits. As these Braggits are distributed directly to the local businesses' social networks, the 'in-feed' marketing Braggits automatically get customized to each individual local business to include their logo, tag line, address, website, phone and more. Once customers interact with these Braggits, all of that great data is sent back to the enterprise for the purposes of aggregating and leveraging that actionable intelligence for better content and customer understanding at the local level.

Full Description: GamerDNA is a social network for online gamers and the massively multiplayer online roleplaying games (or MMORPG) community. The site is focused on providing a place for guilds, gaming groups and individual gamers to interact, find friends, discover gaming content and plan gaming sessions. You can find social networking features like profiles, blogs, pictures, videos and forums on the GamerDNA. Plus, they have special areas for gaming news and actual games. They want to provide gamers a place to socialize while they are still in gaming mode. Users can create their profile pages using characters they play while gaming. For instance, you might write blogs posts and message friends as a wizard, starfighter pilot or elf.  GamerDNA's team is made up of veterans from Eprise, New York Times Digital, Electronic Arts and Mythic Entertainment.  The company was previously knows as GuildCafe. GuildCafe.com (a website devoted to organizing groups within MMORPGs like World of Warcraft and Guild Wars, as well as clan-based multiplayer games such as Halo and Call of Duty) will continue as a separate site, and be improved with new features the company is developing under the GamerDNA brand [Conduit Labs](http://crunchbase.com/organization/conduitlabs) is a similar gaming social network built around virtual worlds.

Description: Amtech Systems, Inc. (Amtech) is a supplier of horizontal diffusion furnace systems used for solar (photovoltaic) cell and semiconductor
Full Description: Amtech Systems, Inc. (Amtech) is a supplier of horizontal diffusion furnace systems used for solar (photovoltaic) cell and semiconductor manufacturing. The Company operates in two business segments: solar and semiconductor equipment, and polishing supplies. The solar and semiconductor equipment is sold under the brand names of Tempress Systems and Bruce Technologies. Within the solar industry, the Company provides diffusion and automation equipment to solar cell manufacturers. Within the semiconductor industry, it provides equipment to manufacturers of analog, power, automotive and microcontroller chips with geometries greater than 0.3 micron. Under the PR Hoffman brand, Amtech is a supplier of insert carriers to manufacturers of silicon wafers, and provides lapping and polishing consumable products, as well as equipment used in various industries.

Description: Platform for Cannabis home growers all over the world. Helping home growers from seed to harvest, no matter how much they know about plants.
Full Description: Grow With Jane is a free mobile app for cannabis growers. At its core Jane is a grow journal, growers log everything they do from seed to harvest and use Jane to keep track of what they did and when. Logging everything in Jane produces what we call a Growlog, its kind of like a report of your grow, similar to what the Facebook timeline looks like with less pictures of family members and more pictures of colas. As we expand on the core, we have reminders, so people can get notifications on what to do and when, private picture so you don't mistakenly show your plants photos to your grandmother while showing her the vacations pictures. Our current mission to improve cannabis growers success, by nudging them in the right direction using insights(contextual recommendations), reminders and other features we intend to improve upon growers success, help them learn from their past mistakes. As we are approaching the release of our online version, we are about to release the fundamentals of what we believe will shape the future of cannabis growing online. With Jane we will connect cannabis growers with seed breeders and fertilizer producers, the ones we believe are the real experts in cannabis growing. Using the seeds database, we can send advice's to growers about the chosen strain and breeder, when is the expected harvest date, and plan accordingly. Perhaps this strain needs less water or it gets too massive at the colas so having a strong stem will be beneficial. Using our Fertilizer Plans, you can apply the designed calendar from the fertilizer producers to your context. If you happen to be watering every 3 days, because of the weather around you, environment temperature, light height and more, we can adapt the calendar to your needs and calculate the appropriate measures to your particular situation, improving your quality of life, helping the novice to not burn their plants or mess with the ph and assist the more advanced users to save some time. Lastly we are releasing community features so growers can share, comment and like their friends grows as well as checking up what else people are growing around the world. Soon the community will be fed with hundreds of thousands of grows from all over the world and company's(seed breeders, fertilizer producers, an more) will be able to monitor how people use their products, learn from the growers themselves, get feedback on their product and improve their offering as well as to tend to issues they may have not expected from having their products being used halfway around the globe.

Description: The first networking platform for students is here. Pitch ideas, share insights, and collaborate on businesses, all on Venzur.
Full Description: Venzur is a social networking platform designed for entrepreneurially-minded high school and college students. An alternative to adult-focused platforms such as LinkedIn, Venzur seeks to promote connection and collaboration among a younger demographic of students. By allowing them to pool their time, resources, and knowledge, Venzur provides an environment in which high school students can team up to successfully build businesses and launch ventures. Venzur was founded after Zach Stevenson realized the need for a professional networking platform for the high school demographic. Teenagers have the drive, ideas, and skills to start innovative businesses, but their age often prevents them from being taken seriously in the entrepreneurial world. Venzur solves this problem by allowing students to network with one another, meet potential cofounders, pitch their ideas, offer feedback to others, and more. As the first social networking platform designed for youth to interact in a professional and collaborative manner, Venzur is built to nurture and grow the innovators and entrepreneurs of the future.

Drivers are spared the arduous task of submitting diagnosis details into alternative sites or worse, calling local shops for alternative offers. Description: Tickle Inc. is a media company providing self-discovery and social networking services.
Full Description: Tickle Inc. was one of the first user-generated content companies and one of the first viral media companies, pioneering A/B testing and other growth techniques now followed by much of the industry.  It provided quizzes, psychological tests developed by PhD's, social networking, matchmaking, photo sharing, and an ad network called Grapevine.  Tickle registered over 150 million people before 2005.   Tickle survived the dot-com bubble burst of 2000, raised just one round of $9M, became profitable in early 2002, was acquired by Monster Worldwide in May 2004 for $110M including earnout, and became part of the overall Monster network for 4 years before being shut down by Monster on December 31, 2008.

Industries: Dating, Social Media, Social Network
Industry Groups: Community and Lifestyle, Internet Services, Media and Entertainment
Description: Sparkology is an invite-only elite online dating site for young and successful professional singles in major metropolitan areas.
Full Description: Founded in 2011 and launched in New York City, Sparkology provides an invite-only luxury online dating site to young professionals in major metropolitan areas. Its service caters to men and women differently to overcome problems that have plagued the traditional online dating behemoths: quality, interaction dynamics, and social discovery.  Beyond being invite-only, Sparkology also requires all male applicants to be verified grads of top universities. These men have already proven their ambition and drive to succeed. Sparkology also has a new business model that treats men and women differently. Men purchase Sparks which are  a virtual currency, to initiate conversations with women; so, women receive meaningful interactions from men who are genuinely interested and financially vested in the conversation. Women no longer receive unwanted impersonal messages, and men no longer need to spam dozens of profiles to receive a response.  Sparkology is the only online dating site to work with professors at major universities to develop a real recommendation algorithm that helps you find your perfect match based on your actions.  Sparkology also offers VIP one-on-one Concierge services to help its members with profile creation, fresh date ideas, and to transition naturally from online to in-person interactions. By changing the entire matchmaking model and focusing on the unique needs of the young professional in major cities, Sparkology is disrupting the dating market.

Plixi specializes in providing an innovative open API, and mobile SDKs, to the developer community of Twitter, Facebook, MySpace, LinkedIn, Foursquare and more to come. The platform empowers third-party application developers to quickly add media sharing capabilities and other unique features to their applications without incurring the resources to build, innovate and manage a media sharing infrastructure. Description: A new social network powered by communities. Built around shared interests & passions
Full Description: Social networking is broken. We're here to fix it. We're all striving for something. We have passions, interests, relationships, families, careers. Every journey is different, yet common threads weave through all of them. Journey takes you back to the things that matter. Common threads form the fabric of Journey. Industry Groups: Education, Gaming, Health Care, Internet Services, Software
Description: A social platform for behavior change that blends peer support with expert guidance through a gamified AI system.
Full Description: GetMotivatedBuddies (GMB) is a subscription-based online social platform that helps people follow through with important but difficult behaviors like working, studying, exercising by using behavioral plans, partnering with others as buddies and in groups, and providing a gamified structure to stay accountable. We collect a user's intention, emotion and action and quality of relationships with the aim of using machine learning to help them stay engaged with healthy, meaningful behaviors over time, and to improve their wellbeing. The site is built around three primary features: planning, positive reinforcement, and working with others as partners or in groups. These features correspond to three behavioral and psychological principles that have been extensively researched and proven to significantly increase productivity and internal motivation: autonomy, competence, and relatedness. These three variables are the fundamental variables of wellbeing. GMB serves consumers and businesses as a two sided marketplace. Individuals join to work on personal improvement and find a supportive community to stay engaged, and businesses such as small to mid size gyms, healthcare centers and schools.  We provided a virtual, supportive community and system based on behavior.

Industries: Events, Social Media, Social Network
Industry Groups: Events, Internet Services, Media and Entertainment
Description: Xfluential is a social engagement cultivation tool.
Full Description: Xfluential is the world’s first engagement cultivation tool. You don’t have to have a massive social network to join, because we can help you build better engagement with contacts you already have and grow your relationships and contact base, especially with the right people. Relationship value should not be determined by the number or frequency of updates, or via endless social media chattering about non-essential things. Nor should it be created from just passing along what others say en masse to everyone else. The best kind of relationships is built on engagement, created when you provide value to everyone with whom you interact, every time. Whether it is through sharing valuable tips on building a company, providing an introduction to a talented developer or a journalist, or an invitation to a private networking event, when you extend help and support, your relationship value grows. The good you do is rewarded when your network of contacts reciprocate with information, introduction, invitations, and/or endorsements of their own. And if you feel like leveraging your strong relationships at anytime, put out your own request for assistance, and watch the help roll in.

At the center of this passion for progress is Jessica Baker, Mark Plaskow, and Richard Linare. Dismayed at the inauthenticity within dating apps post divorce, Jessica was initially motivated to create a product she searched for but couldn’t find. Joined by 20+ years of experience in A.I. and machine learning, Mr.Plaskow, and A.I. expert professor at M.I.T, Mr. Linares, they conceptualized a product that linked people beyond the facade of an image and well marketed profile. Aligned Signs has been talked about on Refinery29, LA Talk Radio, Cosmopolitan, Young Upstarts and more. With over 27,000 members, the team is at the point where their initial bootstrapped 350k will not be sufficient to expand the platform fast enough to meet strong user demand. - The Myers Briggs(R) is used by more 88% of Fortune 500 companies. - Singles spend $82 billion a year on dating. - Americans spend $200+ million on Astrology Aligned Signs combines all three, Western Astrology, Chinese Zodiac, and the Myers Briggs® into one place to help people find self-awareness and genuine, meaningful relationships.

Description: CloudMondo is a online marketplace for OTT network services.
Full Description: CloudMondo is a technology startup based in Silicon Valley, operating in stealth mode and led by a seasoned executive team. The Company has progressed from concept to first customer revenue in 20 months. At CloudMondo we believe that in the 21st Century connectivity to the Internet is a human right. Equivalent to access to fresh water, food, electricity, education, and healthcare. To deliver on this vision, we have developed a data-driven, cloud-based platform. The patent-pending CloudMondo platform leverages AI, Open Source, Virtualization and Software-Defined Networking, to enable the delivery of disruptively affordable connectivity. CloudMondo’s design core dramatically reduces the inherent cost and complexity barriers, long in the way of fulfilling the vision of highly accessible broadband connectivity. To further leverage this state-of-the-art connectivity platform, CloudMondo has developed a tightly-coupled suite of high-value, Over-The-Top (OTT) Services. These can be used by local, regional, national and international entities such as venue owners, municipalities, service providers, property developers, and businesses, to generate profitable revenue while delivering interactive broadband access for their constituents and customers. CloudMondo’s solution was released into production and is already operational with customers in 12 countries and four continents.

Description: FreezeCrowd is a social network platform that connects people.
Full Description: FreezeCrowd is a unique social media platform and network for college students and alumni that connects you in photos with friends! It's cool or unique because everyone has an ice cube over their profile picture, and you "break the ice" when visiting a friends profile. By breaking the ice, you can ask a question, send off a message in the future, play an educational game, among other interesting applications that can be built over the break the ice feature. When you upload a profile picture on FreezeCrowd, it's not just a picture, yet a picture with an ice cube around it, and you can set a timer on the ice cube to melt or freeze over to show that your profile picture is dated, and be notified to upload your most recent picture. This keeps you updated with your profile picture, so that you don't have the same one that is outdated. FreezeCrowd is similar to a school yearbook in some ways, yet online and private to outside searches. Every photo you upload is unique like a snowflake, and categorized. In every photo there is a snowflake, which allows you to click to FreezeTag a friend in the photo as whatever they are (e.g. Biology Major, Business Major, Journalism Major, Golfer, Football Player, etc.), and all photos can be a club photo, team photo, company photo, or friends photo and more. When you FreezeTag a friend you can send off a bubble message to a friend, and connect from within the photo in a group text conversation. Status updates are called a "Thought to Freeze" and you can freeze (or preserve, and schedule an update) a thought, and melt a thought.

Description: Maya’s Mom is a social interactive site enabling parents to share their thoughts via “journals” and receive general parenting advice.
Full Description: Maya's Mom is a social network and advice site for parents, specifically females. Parents can share their thoughts via "journals", join specific groups to get advice and ask questions, and find other parents to connect and share pictures with. The site is based around parenting so you'll find plenty of postings on kids taking first steps, silly kid quotes and general parenting advice.  The site has weekly journal topics like "Songs You Can't Get Out of Your Head" that all parents can choose to write about. Parents can also submit suggestions for future topics. In the "group talk" section, parents can join groups like "Expecting Moms" and "Stay at Home Moms" and ask questions and give each other advice. The group page shows the most popular groups and tracks group conversation activity, so parents can see what topics and issues are relevant to the community.  Paidcontent.org recently announced that BabyCenter, owned by J&J, acquired Maya's Mom for an undisclosed amount. BabyCenter will leave Maya's Mom as a standalone site but will use Maya's Mom's backend social software across its network of sites and blogs.  Along with True Ventures, investors in their angel round included Jeff Clavier, James Currier, Caterina Fake, Geoff Ralston, Raymond Stern, and Michael Tanne. Competitors include [Minti](http://techcrunch.com/tag/minti) and [MothersClick](http://www.mothersclick.com/).

Description: Slap: Sounds like a plan is the new way to live your best life for those who don't like to plan, but are always down to do something fun.
Full Description: Slap is the new creative way to live your best life with your friends or make new ones. It's for people who don’t like to plan, but are always down to do something fun. -- We’ve turned the map into a video-based social calendar that captures future plans with our event stories (Video Invite® + Video RSVPs).  There are plenty of invite services that ‘list’ who’s coming to your event or kickback, but none of them ‘show you’ who’s coming and how excited they are to join in. It’s not where you are now, it’s where you want to be in the next 24 hours.  **************** How to use Slap?  **************** Slap:  Bored? Record a Slap (Video Invite®) to start an event story telling your friends or the world what you want to do. Then pin the location of where you’ll be on your map. Explore: Looking for something to do? Surf the Slap Map to see what your friends have posted they’ll be doing. Don't miss out, spontaneous event stories disappear within the next 24 hours. Slap back:  Find something interesting to do? Slap back by recording a video RSVP to tell your friends you’re in. Start enjoying the anticipation of the event as the Slaps start coming in and you see how psyched everyone is. Messaging:  Once you Slap back that you'll be joining in, you'll unlock the group chat with everyone else who will be going. **************** When all of your favorite people are sharing and discovering things for you to join in on, life will get a lot more interesting.

Industries: Analytics, Human Resources, Machine Learning, Predictive Analytics, Social Network

Description: Organizational effectiveness tool using Machine Learning, Network Theory & People Analytics to drive Diversity, Innovation & Engagement.
Full Description: OrgAnalytix is an Organizational effectiveness tool that uses cutting-edge Machine learning, Network Analysis, and People Analytics to help companies develop long-term sustainable programs that enhance Diversity, Innovation, and Employee Engagement in their teams.   Our innovative approach first uses Relationship network maps to identify the key influencers who are driving your employee behaviors and morale.  We then help leaders identify ways to enhance this influence and harness it further OR mitigate/correct the influence, as appropriate.  Our Machine Learning models identify network roles played by each employee, and their ability to be 'contagious' in within the team.  People Analytics is used to further develop the appropriate pathways for these influencers and the most appropriate action plans. Our past clients include Stanley Black & Decker, Barclays Capital, Walker Information, and First Internet Bank.  In addition, we just got approval from Deloitte Consulting as an approved Technology Vendor for their Human Capital practice.

Description: Developed to fulfill a basic human need, for people to have a place to go to enjoy various social interactions with other people
Full Description: The Social Club Hub was developed to fulfill a basic human need, for people to have a place to go to enjoy various social interactions with other people – to entertain themselves, make new friends and have a place where they feel welcomed and belong.  Socialclubhub.com is not a dating site and is available for all social and economic groups to use.  The trademark has been approved, the patent is in place and international application rights are reserved thru Patent Cooperation Treaty (PCT).    The socialclubhub.com business model is based on the fact that there are numerous people in all areas of the United States and other countries seeking to expand their social interaction with others through participation in social events and activities.  The Social Club Hub website is a national network of clubs created for people who have gone through a life transition such as relocation, loss of a spouse, recent empty nesters, divorced, or just looking to meet people with common interests and hobbies.  Clubs provide the activities ranging from passive to active, from book clubs to running clubs and anything in between.  The Social Club Hub provides an event calendar so people can participate in events either at home or while traveling.  We currently have clubs, members and groups participating all over the US.  The income potential is enormous.  When an individual joins the Social Club Hub they fill out their profile indicating what type activities are of interest to them, as well as their approximate age and gender. The purpose is to be able to match that person with clubs that provide them with that experience and inform them when an event is upcoming.  Ads can then be targeted to match products and services with people that are already known to be interested.  100% of the people seeing the ad are already potential customers!   Ads on the Social Club Hub website will not only be coordinated with the individual member’s known activity interest.

Industries: File Sharing, Music, Social Network
Industry Groups: Internet Services, Media and Entertainment, Music and Audio, Software
Description: Qloud enables users to enjoy and share their music collections on social networks.
Full Description: Qloud (pronounced "cloud") is an online music service launched by former AOL'ers Mike Lewis and Toby Murdock and backed by Steve Case's Revolution LLC and former music industry executives. The service allows users to enjoy and share their music collections within their favorite social networks. The company powers the My Music application on Facebook, was also a launch partner in [Google's OpenSocial initiative](http://www.techcrunch.com/2007/10/30/details-revealed-google-opensocial-to-be-common-apis-for-building-social-apps/), and with iLike was the exclusive music provider for Hi5. In addition to playing back a user's library, Qloud also enables users to browse friends' music libraries to see what they are listening to presently.  The service grew to over 3 million users in its first 6 months after launch.  In Q2 2008, it was acquired by [BUZZMEDIA](http://crunchbase.com/organization/buzznet).  It now counts over 27 monthly uniques and is available on Facebook, Bebo, Hi5, Friendster, MySpace, [Buzznet](http://www.buzznet.com), and Qloud.com The My Music application competes with similar social music services like [Last.FM](http://www.crunchbase.com/organization/last.fm),[iLike](http://www.crunchbase.com/organization/ilike), [imeem](http://www.crunchbase.com/organization/imeem), and [Pandora](http://www.crunchbase.com/organization/pandora). Following the acquisition, Mike Lewis and Toby Murdock became EVP of Product and Engineering at BUZZMEDIA

Industries: E-Commerce, E-Commerce Platforms, Grocery, Social Network
Industry Groups: Commerce and Shopping, Food and Beverage, Internet Services
Description: Shared Basket is a Social grocery shopping platform. It reduces the time spent on grocery shopping by making your friends shop for you.
Full Description: Shared Basket is POOLED GROCERY SHOPPING. 1. Make group of friends. 2. Everybody should make their Grocery Shopping List. 3. Discuss your Grocery Shopping items with your friends. Because you might be purchasing it from somewhere else and your friend from somewhere else. 4. With discussion you will find that many of your items are matching. i.e. you buys from same stores. 5. You are purchasing most (nearly 70%) of the groceries from one store which might be on a distance and rest of the items you are purchasing in every 3–4 days. 6. Now by this you you get many additional advantages like:       1. Get to know how many different stores are there.       2. Get to know the different brands together with their prices.       3. Get to know in which section which store marks up and in which section currently SALE is going on.       4. Get to know what others are purchasing and where they are saving.       5. You can do combine shopping in BULK.       6. You can share your excess groceries or borrow theirs.       7. You get organized.       8. You will be way more updated about groceries.       9. You won’t have to stand in lines every week.     10. You will save your GAS going again and again to different stores.     11. The best part is “You will save TIME, MONEY, ENERGY” 7. Now, for these remaining 30% groceries i.e. 4-5 or 8-10 items every 3–4 days you can ask your friends to bring stuffs for you together with their groceries. And while doing your monthly grocery shopping you can bring few things for your friends as well.  BONUS: - This way you will be maintaining Social Distancing as well. This makes Grocery delivery absolutely free for you. We take privacy very seriously, which is why Shared Basket has the privacy measures to let you hide or show list items to friends, keeping it completely secure. Shared Basket currently has product catalogs from Costco, Walmart, Target, Safeway, Indian Grocery stores, 99 Ranch market, Sprouts farmers market and Whole Foods for the user to choose from. Many more stores to come. We have a built-in, AI based Amart Wallet for your receipts and coupons. Smart Wallet lets users resolve conflicts on the prices they pay for the items. For clear communication between group members, we've also built a chat functionality within the app (similar to WhatsApp). All, the balances are maintained within Shared Basket and the users get an option to settle up balances with others (like Splitswise)

Description: I'm just a 19 years old girl
Full Description: FunAdvice is a social question and answer service where anyone 13 or older can sign up, ask questions post advice, share photos and make friends. Started in March, 2003, FunAdvice is run by a virtual team from Miami Florida with staff and volunteer "advisors" located the world over, from Canada to Australia. The free service offers people the ability to ask questions on any topic with a few restrictions on commercial questions, harm, and or abuse per the terms of use on the site, categorized into twenty-five different categories. By entering interests, members can then see other people who are also interested in the same topics as well as view related photos, questions, status updates, videos and howtos. After free registration, members can get new answer notifications by email, or opt out if they wish. FunAdvice points is a new feature of the site in 2010 that enables members to cash out 10 US cents per point earned on the site from other members "liking" their answers, writing howtos or adding tips. Tips are small, bite sized bits of knowledge that are sent via email to the opt in list of members, which is over 70,000 Monday through Friday.

Industries: Blockchain, Cryptocurrency, Mobile Apps, Professional Networking, Recruiting, Social Network
Industry Groups: Apps, Community and Lifestyle, Financial Services, Internet Services, Mobile, Other, Payments, Professional Services, Software
Description: The Decentralized Professional Network
Full Description: MBYS is a decentralized talent network for the modern professional. Currently, the standard for people seeking employment or a way to connect with colleagues is to create a LinkedIn profile. The unfortunate reality, however, is that these profiles are sold to third parties and also have their public data scraped by advertisers and other nefarious groups. Many LinkedIn users also admit to proactively adding people they do not have a real relationship with, contributing to the rampant depersonalization social media is known for. And on the job recruiter’s end, the profiles they buy access to are often inactive or untruthful, effectively making the hiring process a cost center for the business.  MBYS offers a solution to both reward users for the professional data they produce, and also gives companies an inexpensive tool for recruiting verified talent, all the while keeping the user’s data private and out of the hands of third parties. Users stake their MESH tokens on validating profiles of members of their network, and companies use MBYS tokens to purchase profile data directly from users. Our mission is to build a decentralized professional network that gives users complete control over their data, and incentivizes them to grow and maintain their networks, and get hired.

Mivasocial is not your regular social network, it goes further by developing and providing tools and social applications very useful to solve African problems, to improve democracy and to create opportunities for African populations. Mivasocial is the largest web, mobile, media platform and social network ever build for Africa. The platform implements a vast ecosystem of web sites and applications interconnected aimed individually to solve a specific problem in Africa and the African Diaspora around the world. MivaSocial is designed and created by Jean-Marc Kouevidjin and Nasser Falana. the platform was officially launched on 6 may 2013.

Description: Doing Good should be fun and rewarding...We make it Awesome!
Full Description: Our Family “The Awesome Pope 5” together created AWESOME A new social network for kindness. Where users can Create,Reward and Join video kindness challenges. It’s like TikTok for kindness.  Creators of Good Content are rewarded for their efforts. AWESOME has created a NEW way for you to show gratitude and instantly be rewarded by your following by receiving kindness koins. Think about if every “like” you ever received was worth 5c. AWESOME created just another way for your friends and fans to show gratitude and love for the content you are creating. Many fans don’t comment or join a video kindness challenge but they would like to show more encouragement and love than the like button provides. Here’s where they can be involved and truly reward you. Some examples of the Kindness Challenges are: Be a parking meter fairy- putting coins in expired parking meters in hopes to help someone you never meet possibly not get a ticket. OR Cupcakes for kindness- make cupcakes and show how you do it and deliver it to a neighbor or someone you just met for the first time.OR Blessings in a bag- create a bag of goodies for our less fortunate friends who are homeless. A tooth brush, tooth paste, water, vitamin-C, cookies or crackers, deodorant, and a note of encouragement and love. Kindness Koins- is a virtual digital currency that users receiving can redeem for gift cards to Groceries and Shopping around the world. Stores like like Amazon, Apple, PlayStation, Starbucks, Target Plus all your favorite restaurants or delivery apps or gift cards to support the dozens of charities listed.(20KK=1$US) To “get more” Kindness Koins for free users can watch rewarded ads or users can purchase as many as they wish in bundles.  As you participate in AWESOME you earn points and level up with your halo growing brighter and changing colors. Exchange points for animated upgrades in the virtual store. Try Inviting friends and followers to join you in a kindness challenge making the world more Awesome, then award them kindness koins. Invite followers to follow from other platforms by gifting kindness koins. There are unlimited opportunities to reward and award the use of the kindness koins. Imagine microfunding charities in fundraising kindness challenges or funding teachers classrooms by celebrating teachers' challenges they share for their class. Churches can help the underprivileged microfunding for materials and food for families in need. Creating AWESOME came After my wife Jill died 3 years ago in a texting-while-driving accident, I was left to navigate raising our 4 children under 10. Making sure my children grow into beautiful kind hearted adults is my greatest goal. These guys are growing up in a digital Social World and I want to help to do everything I can to provide them with the best tools possible, but there are no fun digital tools to create and celebrate kindness. We have seen the strength and empowerment that comes when one person does just one act of kindness, the ripple effect it creates. But how to provide a venue or tool to make it easy to create that ripple effect?   I have owned and operated multiple motels on the Beaches in Florida, a restaurant bar, created a clothing manufacturing company, started 2 different TV shows and a radio show. Plus a multi million dollar Realestate brokerage selling large estates. Now we are seeking partnerships for development and growth to make this platform the most AWESOME Social platform on the planet..

Description: Internet2 is a collaboration of many U.S.-based universities to develop networking and advanced applications for learning and research.
Full Description: Internet2 is a collaboration of many U.S.-based universities to develop networking and advanced applications for learning and research. The Internet2 community develops and deploys network technologies for the future of the internet. These technologies include large-scale network performance measurement and management tools, secure identity and access management tools, and capabilities such as scheduling high-bandwidth, high-performance circuits. Internet2 members serve on several advisory councils, collaborate in a variety of working groups and special interest groups, gather at spring and fall member meetings, and are encouraged to participate in the strategic planning process. The Internet2 Project was originally established by 34 university researchers in 1996 under the auspices of EDUCOM.

Description: Slooh is an astronomy platform that aims to connect humanity through communal exploration of the universe.
Full Description: Since 2003, Slooh makes astronomy incredibly easy, engaging and affordable for anyone with a desire to see outer space for themselves. Slooh connects telescopes to the Internet for access by the broader public, and creates free, advertising supported programs featuring the view through our live telescopes. We recently signed a Space Act Agreement with NASA in March 2014 to "Bring the Universe to Everyone and Help Protect Earth, Too” which validates our market leading position. Slooh’s automated observatories develop celestial images in real-time for broadcast to the Internet. Slooh’s technology is protected by Patent No.: US 7,194,146 B2 which was awarded in 2006. Slooh members have taken over 2.5m photos/140,000 FITS of over 40,000 celestial objects, participated in numerous discoveries with leading astronomical institutions and made over 2,000 submissions to the Minor Planet Center.  Our flagship observatories are situated on Mt. Teide, in partnership with the Institute of Astrophysics of the Canary Islands (IAC), and in Chile, in partnership with the Catholic University. Slooh has also broadcast live celestial events from partner observatories in Arizona, Japan, Hawaii, Cypress, Dubai, South Africa, Australia, New Zealand and Norway. Slooh’s live broadcasts of potentially hazardous asteroids (PHAs), comets, transits, eclipses, solar activity etc. feature narration by astronomy experts Will Gater and Bob Berman, and are syndicated to media outlets worldwide, including TIME, National Geographic, Wired, NBC, and many more.

Description: Over60 brings Australian seniors together in one place to share ideas and experiences and to support each other.
Full Description: Over60 – the one-stop destination to keep Aussies over-60 in the know. Reaching 60-years young is a milestone that can signal the start of some of the most rewarding times in life and it’s not without its challenges. They’ve created OverSixty.com.au in the hope of bringing Australian seniors together in one place to share ideas, experiences and support each other through this exciting stage in life. Along the way they’ll bring you inspiring content on a range of topics as well as special offers and deals. One of the perks of being part of the fastest growing demographic in Australia is that lots of great Aussie companies want your business – and they’ll make sure they work hard to give you the best offers possible. They want you to think of OverSixty.com.au as “your” site! And most importantly, a community aimed at creating a sense of belonging where you can read about the things you’re interested in, have a say, communicate with other over-60s, share stories and make new friends along the way.

Description: The assistant for your social life.
Full Description: Laila's mission is for you to experience life with friends. Our flagship product is a social assistant that nudges users with opportunities to get together with friends. The recommendations are generated from our AI’s ability to predict group intent and are tailored to each user & group. Our business model of driving traffic for offline businesses allows us to build a product that promotes social interaction instead of isolation.  We noticed how societal norms are changing. We are establishing our family lives later, we are more transient, more individually focused. But we aren’t happier. 30% of Millennials say they’re consistently lonely; that’s 1 in 3 of us. The picture is even bleaker for college students. 64% reported feeling very lonely during the last year. We are more connected to information but less connected to each other. Laila is currently an iOS app designed for college students that delivers a prediction of your friends' willingness to hangout, tailored recommendations of things to do, and a stream of events happening around campus. Laila runs in the background and nudges you to ask your friends to do things when it makes sense. Just how Netflix and Spotify tailor their experience for music & video, Laila does the same but with the goal of enhancing your social life.

Industries: E-Commerce Platforms, Marketplace, Sharing Economy, Social Network
Industry Groups: Commerce and Shopping, Internet Services, Other
Description: Trust Networks for the Sharing Economy
Full Description: Aqqaint fundamentally changes the way individuals and organizations think of trust in the sharing economy by delivering the first platform to incorporate interpersonal trust and online reputations in a meaningful way.   Aqqaint is a trust networking platform that allows anyone to exchange products, services, and reviews safely.  Our service extends our member's reputation beyond first-degree connections to build powerful networks without sacrificing trust, for the sharing economy. People want to make and save money sharing the stuff they own or selling their goods or services to others in need.  This is evidenced by the 157 million users who visit peer-to-peer classified sites each month.  In fact, the sharing economy is expected to top $335 billion by 2025.  The other important factor for individuals is trust.  92% of people surveyed trust recommendations from people they, more than any other source.  Trust is built on four key fundamentals; credibility, reliability, intimacy, and understanding motivation.  All of these are built over time and through repeated activity.  So, it’s no wonder that we trust people we know more than strangers. While there are a handful of options to facilitate these peer-exchanges they all completely ignore or poorly handle the role of trust.  This has created an environment of anonymity and zero accountability on the ends of the buyer or seller.  On some platforms it has created an environment conducive to scams and violent crimes.  On others it has created a negative incentive for sellers to propagate fake or highly-incentivized reviews to drive sales. 70% of Americans report shopping online and spent more than $452 billion last year alone. Environmental factors and stagnant wages for the middle class are driving people to save money and live sustainable lifestyles.  Millennials in particular are driven to make their dollar count.  So reliable reviews and a safe means to buy or borrow used goods and services is extremely valuable. Aqqaint delivers an environment that removes the uncertainty from the current sharing economy and peer-review systems through trust networks curated by our members which extend their real-life reputation to the web.  Aqqaint’s members build a powerful network of trusted individuals as they can exchange with anyone, they share a direct or mutual connection with.  Additionally, organizations such as schools, non-profits, corporations, etc can establish customized “Aqqaint Communities”, trust networks, for their members or employees which add value, engagement, and increase retention.  These trust networks can be used to exchange goods, services, or share reviews.   Overview: Aqqaint provides all the functionality you would find in an online classified tool such as LetGo, OfferUp, or Craiglist, plus a patent-pending AI-assisted Trust Scoring Machine (TSM) that evaluates and scores individual users trustworthiness based on common interpersonal trust traits, user feedback, and outside information.   Members start by connecting with people or organizations they trust, and then in a similar fashion to LinkedIn, Aqqaint displays mutual connections where to expand the power of that members sharing network.  From there members can buy, sell, loan, rent, look for and share reviews with one another.   Who’s on Aqqaint: Aqqaint’s trust networks are made up of a combination of individuals from all walks of life.  We have college students just starting out to baby boomers looking to downsize.  The primary demographic that Aqqaint is seeing the highest engagement from are 21-35-year-old’s who are familiar with the sharing economy and want to make an impact through their personal consumption behavior.   We have also seen great interest from community leaders who are looking to create trust networks on Aqqaint for their organizations.  They are focused on adding value for members and boost retention rates.  Some of which have paid memberships for their particular organization. Currently, we have a neighborhood association, a parent teacher organization for a local school, a major U.S. University with more than 15,000 members including students and alumni, and a federal union with over 1 million members. All have actively demonstrated their intention to take advantage of our community feature.

Description: Ascent was founded to expand access to care for those with addiction and improve outcomes using long term care.
Full Description: Ascent is a national tele-health provider of certified addiction support services that uses artificial intelligence to predict impending relapse and deliver proactive coach led interventions.  The service provides value add for end users by being delivered through its integrated  chronic disease management platform by Sober Grid, Inc The Sober Grid app has been studied by researchers who have identified that there is a correlation with the use of the Sober Grid app and lower relapse rates.  Ascent powered by Sober Grid's clients include municipal governments, insurance companies managed care organizations, drug courts, health care providers, hospitals, and treatment clinics in the United States.  Ascent employs a staff of state certified addiction recovery coaches to provide on demand and scheduled sessions. Coaches are staffed 24/7/365. Coaches can be accessed via scheduled meetings or on -demand as crisis management.  Available anytime, anywhere the low cost support democratizes addiction support while eliminating traditional barriers to accessing support such as access to transportation, rural settings, fear of stigma, and scheduling conflicts.  All coaches are trained and certified by a state government in both addiction and mental health.  Coaches adhere to the critical philosophy of multiple pathways of recovery. Coaches all have lived experience and have related real life experience and have successfully stayed in remission from acute symptoms of relapsing for a number of years.

Description: VR/AR Social Network & Content Discovery platform
Full Description: CLEVR is a social network focused exclusively on the emerging VR/AR market. Through uniting all devices CLEVR restores a fragmented market and adds a layer of discovery through viral channels. CLEVR has solved two problems…. 1)  Solved Fragmentation and Social.  CLEVER brought a fragmented VR market and fragmented social landscape into one unified HUD.  As we have all heard time and time again, "mobile is fragmented."  Virtual Reality only magnifies the problem. CLEVR has the solution. First, we've reversed engineered our way into every VR platform and brought together the connectivity, all devices can now talk to each other.  Secondly, CLEVR has taken all of the various social networks you use (Facebook, Slack, WhatsApp, etc) and brought those APIs into one feed, one single HUD.  All of your social connections are now in one single view. 2)  Made VR content discoverable.  We've done this through two approaches.  First, in our stand alone app, CLEVR displays what games your friends are currently enjoying and playing AND on which platform.  Secondly, we're creating an in-game HUD (SDK) for developers to use where players can pop up the CLEVR social network, within the content itself (games, movies, etc) thus allowing players to shout out to their friends on their social graph and invite them to the game.  Now VR content is discoverable through your social graph. SOLUTION/PRODUCT To the point, CLEVR is a social platform that unites all VR devices and allows users to discover new content (games, movies, any VR content).  A lot of buzzwords, yes. But every generation of platforms the same discoverability issues emerge. CLEVR is taking advantage of the black hole in the market and has taken first mover advantage.

Industry Groups: Content and Publishing, Internet Services, Media and Entertainment
Description: Phanfare is a photo-sharing service that integrates social networking functionality to allow users to create connections with others.
Full Description: Phanfare is a photo-sharing service with lots of potential. The company relaunched their product in January 2007 with enhanced sharing capabilities and a free 1GB version meant to entice users who are not ready to pay $55 per year for unlimited storage. The company found that the first version of its service didn't make it easy enough for its 11,000 paying members to share their hosted media with each other. Sharing usually had to be done by manually emailing password-protected links to family and friends. These emails would get lost, and with them, the URLs and passwords contained within. The new version of Phanfare addresses this issue by integrating social networking functionality that enables users to create connections with one another and specify which content they want to make available to their Phanfare contacts. The photo sharing capabilities are very similar to Facebook's, although users have more control on who sees which particular content. Phanfare also allows users to store photos and videos in a application on the desktop. It then syncs the media automatically with the web. Currently, this desktop client is only available for the PC but the company has been working on a version for the Mac as well.  Akin to [SmugMug](http://www.smugmug.com/), Phanfare converts the videos to Flash allowing them to be easily viewed online; users can also download them in their original form. There is also no Phanfare Facebook application or iPhoto plugin, but these too may be available in the future. A plethora of other competitors offer desktop photo storage and management applications. Some include: [Shutterfly](http://www.crunchbase.com/organization/Shutterfly), [Snapfish](http://www.crunchbase.com/organization/Snapfish), [Kodak](http://www.kodakgallery.com/Welcome.jsp), and [Picasa](http://picasa.google.com/). Online players include [Fabrik](http://www.myfabrik.com/), [Flickr](http://www.crunchbase.com/organization/Flickr), [SmugMug](http://www.smugmug.com/),  [PBase](http://www.pbase.com/), and [Fotki](http://www.fotki.com)

Industries: Dating, Social Media, Social Network
Industry Groups: Community and Lifestyle, Internet Services, Media and Entertainment
Description: Todayter provides same day installation service of noise deadening materials and window armoring.
Full Description: Todayter is an introduction-based dating network that keeps the wonder of love wide open, without sacrificing your time and privacy. TODAYTER IS A DATING NETWORK Browsing through dating sites can often feel like you're bouncing like a ball through a pinball machine. There are plenty of dating sites that, at least initially, open their doors to anybody. We're told to choose our friends carefully, so why not be a little more choosy about our dating community? The solution is simple: by implementing an introduction-based dating network, Todayter ensures your online time will be much more productive and hassle free; a place where you meet the people you want to meet. No spammers, scammers or Internet trolls. The objective is not to eliminate the old paradigm, but rather to improve upon it. People donâ€:tm:t want their contact information distributed amongst the entire Internet. Todayter is a dating network that strangers canâ€:tm:t see, search, or subvert. This prevents non-members from viewing profiles or a list of our current members. The wonder of love should be kept wide open, but that doesnâ€:tm:t mean your dating network has to be. THE DATING GAME We know that dating can often feel like a big torturous game. Todayter lets you be the ultimate player. In an effort to transcend some of the negative stigma linked to online dating, we reward all efforts made on Todayter. We award points based on your dating skills, hard work, and dedication. This opens the gates to another part of someone's personality, reflected in the badges theyâ€:tm:ve earned for their activity, adding unique value to a profile. Todayter also recognizes that personalities are too vast and complicated to organize and calculate them through the use of lengthy formulas and surveys. A dating site's idea of a "perfect match" is not always the "perfect match". By implementing a dating feedback system, members will be able to see how they stack up against the rest. We let people rate their dates, so you don't just have to take their word for it. Datability Feedback isn't based on somebody's idea of compatibility, but focuses on human behavior and the way people act socially, holding people accountable for their actions as well as their words. It takes some of the guesswork out of dating. FEATURES â€¢    Rewards-  Specially designed badges are awarded to members for a variety of actions, such as signing up, inviting friends, going on dates, getting good ratings, and using the site regularly. Gift Certificates will be distributed monthly for reaching invitation/sign-up records. â€¢    Date Feedback- After each date, both daters will be given the opportunity to fill out a feedback questionnaire rating the person they went on a date with. Datability scores will be displayed on all member profiles, adding accountability and value to each member. â€¢    Crush List- If you find someone particularly intriguing, you may add them to your Crush List, they will be notified and will then be available to request a date from them. â€¢    Todayter Blog- All blog material provided by in house blog curator, Sarah Roxanne Shields (sarahrox), highlighting dating culture trends and other various relationship-related material. Guest Submissions are welcome. THE BIOCHEMISTRY OF LOVE Common interests are important, but on most dating sites everything you learn about someone is based entirely on what the person decides to reveal. Weâ€:tm:ve tried to design a profile that will allow you to tell people something about yourself while avoiding the superficial questions that litter other popular dating sites. The true purpose of Todayter is to bring people together. Todayter promotes the face-to-face aspect of dating, which is going on actual dates. Because that's when the true connection is made. That's when you know where things are going, and where they aren't. It's a chemical fact. There are three chemicals which complete the trifecta of the feeling we call love: Dopamine, Norepinephrine, and Oxytocin. In relationships, these chemicals create, motivate and sustain us all. But in order to experience them, we need physical contact. We need to see, hear, and smell. The culture of love is becoming too introverted, too virtual. Todayter's goal is to act as a catalyst for real-life love connections, encouraging people to meet up and rewarding them for it. Only then will we trigger the biological system that fuels romantic connections and allow the chemicals of love to surge into action.

Full Description: Lexody is the missing resource in language learning - experiencing a real-life conversation with a native speaker! Took 3 years of Spanish in high school, but have never had a Spanish conversation? Trying to maintain a childhood language? Lexody is for you! The language-learning industry predominately targets beginners, and there is a huge lack of services for the intermediate to advanced language learners.  Lexody allows you to take your language skills to the next level, and actually start immersing into any language. Is this a replacement for all other language learning methods? No! Is this the missing link, to actually immerse and become fluent? Yes! Lexody is a complement to all existing apps and schools. Lex = Language EXperience  Example Lex: I am learning Spanish. I can find a Spanish speaker in my city, who is trying to perfect their English. We will meet up at a local cafe or bar, and spend 30 minutes speaking only in Spanish, and then 30 minutes speaking only in English. This allows both learners to completely immerse in their target language.

Full Description: Here’s the Deal: Airport travel doesn’t have to be a drag! SHOP. DINE. RELAX. FlyInStyle helps travelers connect with their favorite brands & retailers for instant deals, product launches, exclusive offers, happy hours & more, to make airport down time fly by. Whether you’re a business traveler, a tourist, a parent, or just a plain bored frustrated passenger, FlyInStyle will help you uncover exciting deals, exclusive offers & fun events at the airport to not only pass the time, but look forward to it! Enjoy your favorite brands; try new restaurants; know where to go. It's that simple. FlyInStyle users get access to insider information, exclusive sales & events, special offers and up-to-the-minute notifications in real-time. WHAT'S IN IT FOR YOU: · Geolocation – to identify nearest airport with active offers quickly & easily. · Category navigation - to find what you need, when you need it: All, Dining, Drinks, Duty Free, Family, Newsstand, Services, & Shopping. · Family category - offers meant for you and the kids! · Duty Free category - perfect for international travelers to find that one last gift! · Services category – for when you need a little help or maybe some ideas to relax. · Favorites list - so you can bookmark an offer to remember later. · Social Media sharing – so you can share your favorite finds with your friends! · Offer types – promotions, instant discounts, invitations, new product announcements, travel exclusives, gifts with purchase, articles, entertaining videos, shop-ahead & much more! · Global International Airports - no matter where you land! · Notifications – to notify you when there is a nearby offer or something you may like to try. WHAT OTHERS ARE SAYING: Take it from our founder Amanda Anthony, “Our market-leading smartphone app will help travelers find shopping, dining and service promotions, including happy hours and special sales events.” The Sun Sentinel described it as, “an app to help travelers shop at airports.” The Americas Duty Free and Travel Retailing described it as, “the first airport app of its kind, specializing in improving the airport experience by showcasing offers and events in retail and restaurants.” The Moodie Report said, “opportunities are endless to offer travelers additional value beyond what is in the market today.” “The technology works by geolocating the customer and promoting retail and dining deals tailored by airport to them.” Travel Markets Insider described it as, “an engaging new promotional channel for the travel retail industry.” The Reef described it as, “a personal traveling assistant.” Click Brain Startups, Technology, and Marketing described it as, “an intriguing model.”

Industries: Content, Digital Media, Social Media Marketing, Social Network
Industry Groups: Internet Services, Media and Entertainment, Sales and Marketing
Description: Make smarter decisions together.
Full Description: WeeAct is the free, decision-making iOS app where users make smarter decisions by crowd-voting choices with others and then sharing the outcomes. How It Works: CREATE – Post an everyday decision and two choices. VOTE - Other users vote on which choice you should pick. DECIDE - Review the votes, make your decision, and share the outcome of your decision with everyone who voted. Launch a WeeAct campaign around any decision using text and pictures. Here are some example decisions that WeeAct can help you make: - Fashion: What outfit should I wear? - Lifestyle: Which haircut should I get? - Consumer: What brand should I buy? - Blogging: Which tutorial should I post next on my blog? - Events: Which party should I go to tonight? - Design: What color should I paint my room? - Investing: Which stock should I buy? - Romance: Who should I go out on a date with? - Education: Which class should I enroll in? - Fitness: What should I do for my workout? - Health: What food should I eat on my diet? - Social: Which picture should I use in my profile? WeeAct Benefits: ● Create a decision campaign and harness the wisdom of the crowd in just seconds. ● Don't passively browse content. Participate in the decision-making of other users by voting on their choices and inspiring them to act. ● Stop scrolling through feeds of content that you don't care about. Automatically personalize your feed on WeeAct because every time you vote on a decision, you'll receive relevant content that shows the outcome. ● Stop wasting time looking at ads. WeeAct does not support or show ads anywhere on the app and all of our content is crowd-sourced by regular, everyday people, just like you! ● Think you give good advice? See for yourself using WeeAct's Voting Accuracy which tracks how often what you picked is the choice that gets made. ● Get feedback without the noise. Harassment is a major issue on some apps, but on WeeAct users cannot message each other and no one can post comments on campaigns. ● Create content your audience wants. Make your audience feel like they are part of the creative decision-making process by crowd-voting your content on WeeAct. ● Use our 5-star rating system to rate each other's decisions based on the success or failure of the outcome. ● Increase your vote totals by sharing your WeeAct campaigns on different social networks. ● WeeAct is committed to protecting all user data on our application. We do not sell or share any user data with third parties. The Human Intelligence App: WeeAct has been designed to take advantage of human intelligence by eliminating biases that exist within the crowd. Each voter is ambiguous to the decision-maker, which allows people to vote, honestly, based on their own experiences with that decision. The crowd becomes smarter as more votes are cast on any single decision by eliminating these biases. If life is just a series of decisions, WeeAct is too valuable of a utility not to use. If you struggle to make decisions, WeeAct will revolutionize your life. Download our app for free today and start making smarter decisions . . . together. Got feedback? Send us a message at info@weeact.com. Check out our social media on Twitter and Instagram @WeeActApp

Industry Groups: Community and Lifestyle, Internet Services, Media and Entertainment
Description: Story of My Life is a social networking site that enables users to write their life story, and share it securely with friends and family.
Full Description: Story of My Life by Eravita is an ambitious social networking site that wants to collect everyone's life story and link them together. Users are encouraged to write their life story, which they can choose to share with friends, family or the site's community. The site's home page lets you search for people and view major events in "today's history". Also, Story of My Life has a tool to build your family tree, further displaying their life-history collecting goals.  Users can blog their daily thoughts in what the site likes to refer to as "journals". You can choose to share your journal's entries with the site's news feed or family members or keep them private for your eyes only. The site also lets users share pictures, videos and events with each other.  The site has even created a nonprofit entity the Story of My Life foundation to make sure that everyone's stories are "secured and never lost". However, in their FAQs section they state that you must purchase "Forever Space" if you want your story saved forever. The free space is only saved as long as you remain in active user (update your page once every six months).  Competitors include [OurStory](http://www.crunchbase.com/organization/ourstory).

Description: Rover.
Full Description: Rover.com connects dog parents with a nationwide network of dog lovers for hire, offering in-home dog boarding, dog sitting, and dog walking. Founded on the belief that everyone should have the opportunity to experience the unconditional love of a dog, Rover makes it easy for dog parents throughout the U.S. to find sitters who will treat their dog like family. Stays are booked on Rover every minute of every day, and more than 92 percent of the population lives within a short drive of one of Rover’s 25,000 sitters. Ninety-five percent of reviewed stays have received a perfect five-star rating. In addition to connecting pet parents with sitters, the Rover platform offers complimentary premium insurance for all services booked through Rover, 24/7 customer support and vet consultation, mobile apps, photo sharing, videos of stay highlights, and sitter background checks.

Description: Plan sharing made easy
Full Description: At Merj, our mission is to help people connect with one another in real life.  We got tired of watching people spend full days scrolling aimlessly through their phones, knowing full well that their friends were probably doing the exact same thing. Merj allows users to create a network of friends that they would actually want to hang out with and then share their availability and events with those people.  The average person has only a handful of people that they would actually ask to hang out, but countless others that they consider friends.  Merj helps users find plans with more people than they ever would on their own. Merj separates itself from other forms of social networks in its emphasis on driving real-world interaction. Merj allows users to provide two forms of content: availability and events.  "Availability" offers a user the ability to let their friends know when they are looking for something to do; maybe their closest friends are out of town and they aren't sure who to text, Merj lowers the barrier to messaging someone they haven't talked to in a while. "Events" allow users to create events with limited or unlimited numbers of spots available for friends to join as well as with interest tags that when matching a friend's interests will notify that user of the new event. Common applications are pickup sports, parties, day trips.

Description: Asobi is a social and discovery platform for gamers of all skill levels to find, play, and socialize with each other.
Full Description: Despite the tremendous growth of the video game and esport industries, there is no universal platform for gamers of all backgrounds and skill set to find, socialize, and play with each other. As gaming becomes more "social" it becomes increasingly more difficult to find other people (outside of an immediate friend group) to play with and against each other.  Asobi is a discovery platform that allows gamers of all skill levels to find, socialize, and play with each other. We are the only platform that hosts a gaming database of over 100,000 games. Users can utilize the database to create their own gaming list. Their list consists of details which include the console they play their games on, their status on the game, and their top 5 favorite games. By applying these details in conjunction with Asobi's matching technology, users can easily search for others who share similar game interests. Asobi's searching tool includes functionality that allows users to search for other gamers’ profiles by their in-game names (with user consent). By providing a platform that allows gamers to find others and ultimately decrease anonymity, a clearer perspective of the wants and needs of gaming enthusiasts. This presents an advantage for organizations to better analyze their fans.
