Industries: Social Network, Sports
Industry Groups: Internet Services, Sports
Description: PlayerMania.com brings the best amateur players together in order to network, find leagues and show sports history.
Full Description: PlayerMania.com brings the best amateur players together in order to network, find leagues and show sports history.  PlayerMania.com can be described as a combination of Myspace, Facebook and ESPN. It enables athletes to set up a sports profile which displays information about all the sports they play and where they played them. The site even goes as far as letting them link up to current and past high school and college teams by the season that they played. David Wolf, a former division 3 basketball player and founder of PlayerMania.com, believes that pro's shouldn't be the only ones getting all the recognition.  You don't have to be a pro to be a great player. "There are so many great players out there not making millions of dollars, and it's time to bring them together", Wolf said. "We are looking for players who are playing, have played or plan on playing in high school and college." PlayerMania.com is dedicated to the people out there that play for the love of the game. Wolf came up with the idea of the site after finishing college and finding it hard to find competitive leagues and great players. "I would go to the local gym and maybe half of the guys could play; that's not fun when you're used to playing against some really great players." "I also hated how hard it was to find leagues in my area. I would have to go to every park district's web site and dig through all the programs just to find the basketball league", Wolf added. The site solves these issues with its advanced player search and league search feature. The site, which is entirely free, also allows players to write their own sports articles. If you ever wanted to be a sports writer, this is your chance. A really cool feature on the site is that it allows players to rate their friends at various categories of the sports they play. This makes it possible to do a search for a specific player based on rating. This feature works great if, for example, you are starting a recreational basketball team and need a center that can rebound and block shots. Now you can just search for centers in your area with high ratings in rebounds and blocks. Every member also gets a virtual trading card with their uploaded photo that flips 360 degrees. If you're a golfer, you can add your scores and the site will figure out your handicap and rank. Wolf says that there are a lot more features in the works. He aims to make this site the center of every player's life.

Description: Allied Fiber builds and operates network-neutral, fiber optic cable routes across the United States.
Full Description: New: Allied Fiber, LLC provides long-haul and multi-access point, short-haul fiber optic system coupled with network-neutral colocation facilities, and direct access for wireless towers and rural broadband networks. It builds and operates network-neutral, fiber optic cable routes across the United States, connecting sub-sea landing points, wireless towers, data centers, carrier hotels, colocation facilities, enterprises, schools, and governments with multi-access point dark fiber system. The company operates across two primary business segments: Fiber Leasing and Colocation. The Fiber Leasing segment allows customers to lease individual strands of fiber along Allied Fiber’s multi-access point route through the use of its network-neutral dark fiber. The Colocation segment allows customers to lease space within the company’s network-neutral colocation facilities. Its customers include cable companies, wireless operators, wireless backhaul providers, local phone companies, rural network operators, search engines, and social media. Allied Fiber, LLC was incorporated in 2008 and is headquartered in New York, New York.

Industries: Social Entrepreneurship, Social Network, Virtualization
Industry Groups: Community and Lifestyle, Hardware, Information Technology, Internet Services, Software
Description: Virtueconomy is a goodness-mobilizing social enterprise that converts consumer purchases into empowering services for nonprofits
Full Description: Virtueconomy is a for-profit social enterprise that converts sales from socially conscious small businesses into uplifting and empowering nonprofit services.  Compared to for-profit businesses, nonprofits face significant double standards when it comes to overhead expenditure. Most donors have a visceral aversion to overheads, wanting a majority of their donation to go directly to the cause and not towards compensation, advertising & marketing spend, investment in IT and innovation etc. Sadly, this 'Overhead Myth' is crippling the nonprofit sector, stagnating innovation and destroying growth potential. ​It seems counterintuitive that the very organizations that have altruistically committed themselves to making the world a better place, are often constrained from maximally doing so! ​We empower nonprofits to break free from the "The Nonprofit Starvation Cycle" by providing services that help them not just to survive, but to grow! Rather than handouts, we provide leg-ups in areas that they need it most.  Here's how it works: 1) Consumers purchase products from our ecommerce partners 2) A set percentage from each sale is paid by these businesses to Virtueconomy 3) ​We then convert those funds into valuable services for the matched nonprofit partner As a male founder, it was important to me to become an ally and stand up for the gender inequality that continues to persist in the business world.  As such, Virtueconomy's initial focus is on Women Empowerment -- We create shared value by matching female founded enterprises with relevant nonprofits that empower, educate and uplift women.

Industries: Employment, Social Media, Social Network
Industry Groups: Internet Services, Media and Entertainment, Professional Services
Description: About55 is a social networking community
Full Description: About55, "Moving forward. Making a difference." About55 has over 1,200 members who are discovering the resources they need for mid-life self-renewal, and we are just getting started! Our model has several revenue channels, is inherently social, solves a big and recurring consumer need, and is aimed at dominating a mid-life self-renewal market which is dramatically under-served by the competition. Where We Came From About55 was created from the observation of two colliding trends. the rise in economic stress among those in mid-life and the rapid adoption of social media among those in this same group. Many of the current problems being experienced by those in mid-life are clearly visible, such as foreclosure and unemployment. But many of the real symptoms brought on by these events are often hidden and not discussed because those involved are often embarrassed and are caught off-guard by their current situation. To add to their stress, many have also lost much of their peer support because their circle of friends were broken due to these same circumstances. This loss of support and the resulting loneliness has added additional stress to their lives. So, how are these problems brought to the forefront of discussion and resolved? About55 provides a community of peers, expert support and the tools needed to unlock the talents and skills possessed by our membership. A place for our members to grow, explore, renew and celebrate their accomplishments. The formula for self-renewal is proven. The Well-known psychological theorist, Carl Jung, suggest that "the successful resolution of mid-life problems either comes from an increase in self-growth, a new vocation, or often both". Our business niche is to facilitate the delivery of the products and services needed for self-renewal via social marketplace and knowledge sharing platform.   Why We Will Succeed About55 has the right focus at exactly the right time. We bring together and match the needs of our members who are seeking self-renewal resources with experts who can deliver career, life, and relationship coaching. Our solution is a social marketplace that fulfills both the needs of the buyer and the targeted audience sought by the sellers.

Dog owners can use Meetup.com, but organizer fees lower incentives for starting new meetups or maintaining old ones. Dawgtown aims to reimagine the potential for hyper-local mobile engagement by putting a user’s network of dog-friendly people, places, and products in the palm of their hand.

Description: EkkoTV is an online hosted platform that provides real-time communication widgets for websites to interact with their visitors.
Full Description: ekko is an online hosted platform that provides websites a variety of real-time communication widgets enabling their visitors to more effectively interact on their sites. Media companies, content and niche social networks, and aggregators need ways to promote more interaction, conversation and discussion in their sites between experts, professionals, visitors and community members. Many content oriented sites simply allow visitors to post data, media, and comments. There is no real-time communication or discussion around the content within these sites, or the direct ability for members to communicate. These sites also need to maintain their visitors experience and association with their brand and content, while considering how to further the interaction within their sites. Additionally, these sites need ways to draw additional visitors proactively and through their core user base. To that end, ekko provides media companies, content-oriented social networks, and aggregators with a hosted, modular and customizable platform to enable multi-user communication and discussion right within their sites. Using any or all of the ekko platform modules, sites can provide their communities a branded experience with active conversation through broadcast discussions, text (IM), video and/or audio. The modules encourage activity, increasing time spent on the site, and draw new users to the site, simultaneously. The modules include: IM aggregator, white label site-specific IM server, video chat application, shared video player and more. The platform is easily implemented into sites by simply dropping in a few lines of code. It is hosted and managed by ekko and does not require specific hardware and software.

The premise of the site is simple - to allow users to vent about a variety of topics - sex, politics, religion - anything. If a girl was cheated on by her boyfriend, she can vent about it on VentNation. If someone got laid off from his/her job and wants to railroad his/her boss, he/she can come to the site and have at it. Conversely, of course, if a hardcore Bush supporter wants to come to VentNation and vent about how much he thinks Obama is a socialist, he can vent about that as well. We offer everybody the ability to rant about ANYTHING - any significant event they want to release their frustration about. If a user wants to bookmark a site and rant about it, or voice their opinions on a hot news story, VentNation is perfect for that, too.

Description: Recommendations should come from those you trust. Wigeon is a tool for users to exchange, organize, bookmark, and try out recommendations.
Full Description: A recommendation from those you trust is the best way to discover something new. Wigeon is reinventing the way they share. Connect with your friends, send, receive, organize, set reminders for, and discover recommendations in one convenient place.  The recommendation process is scattered. They get recommendations from everywhere: texts, emails, tweets, posts... even convos at the water cooler. However, there is no reliable way to organize, remember, or conveniently try them out. Wigeon gives you the entire recommendation process in one platform. Connect with your friends and exchange recommendations across different categories such as movies, TV shows, YouTube videos, music, podcasts, restaurants, bars, hotels, books, and more. Wigeon will aggregate, organize, and offer one-click-access to experience you recommendations. It’s time to discover what you’ve been missing.

Description: An app that helps you reserve workspace and connect with others in your community.
Full Description: SeatsOpen is an app-based marketplace that connects coworkers with idle space in their communities on a pay-as-you-go basis. We're creating infrastructure to support the future of work. The independent workforce is poised to represent over 50% of workers in the next 10 years. This majority of workers will have vastly different needs and preferences than today’s office workers. Untethered from location and schedule, these workers will be free to practice their craft when and where they choose. Existing offices will no longer meet their demands, but other existing buildings might.
